medical_history.chief_complaint: Symptoms of vomiting, diarrhea, and abdominal tenderness
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms initially began 10 days ago and resolved after 48 hours. They reoccurred this morning with at least 10 episodes of projectile, bilious vomiting and watery, non-bloody diarrhea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. Left breast DCIS 2. Hypercholesterolemia 3. Rheumatic fever age unspecified. Past surgeries include sinus surgery for deviated septum and vaginal hysterectomy for prolapsed uterus.
